queries: Some signers perform this sign with the dominant hand alone.
verblex: 1. To think about things that happened in the past. English = look back.
partlex: 1. Used at the beginning of a sentence to indicate that you are thinking about things that happened in the past. English = looking back. Formal English = on reflection.
nomlex: 1. Thoughts about things that happened in the past. English = recollections.
